name: Splotch Splotch - The Race
description:
Game done during the Ludum Dare 48, Deeper and Deeper.

A Local- multiplayer game, where you play spermatoons who want to ovulate . Compete and race with your friends, but take care of the big and mighty glove !

We took a lot of fun to make it, hope you like it !! Make sure to comment if you have any feedbacks !
